Name: Polimines
About the game: Polimines is a challenging logic game that brings together mechanics from Nonograms and Minesweeper. Solve increasingly difficult hand-designed levels in this puzzle game where guessing is never required. Combine Nonogram and Minesweeper gameplay for a unique puzzle experience. Different level shapes allow for some new mechanics to emerge. Features 30 increasingly difficult levels Relaxing Atmosphere No Guessing Required
